resources.string: This Complication uses legacy "Badges", previously used by launchers. You may need to force stop and re-open %1s after adding this complication.
Manually clear the notification count, if it is stuck. %1s may re-set the count once opened
Display a count of Facebook notifications from the Facebook app
This Complication requires the Facebook app
Display a count of Twitter notifications from the Twitter app
This Complication requires the Twitter app
Display a count of WhatsApp notifications from the WhatsApp app
This Complication has been replaced and will be removed in a future update, consider removing and replacing with the new WhatsApp Notifications complication (included in the same plugin)
This Complication has been replaced, please use the new one included in this plugin
This Complication requires the WhatsApp app
Display a count of Instagram message notifications from the Instagram app
This Complication requires the Instagram app
Display a count of Threads notifications from the Threads app
This Complication requires the Threads app
Display a count of Telegram notifications from the Telegram app
This Complication requires the Telegram app
Display a count of unseen Google Voice messages, calls and voicemails
This Complication requires the Google Voice app
Display a count of unread Outlook messages
This Complication requires the Outlook app
Display a count of unread K9 Mail messages
This Complication requires the K9 Mail app
